title: Chinese people in ranked?
body: I haven't played much ranked this season and my past few games have been full of Chinese people,  every ranked game its 2 or 3 on my team and I'm lucky when 1 of them can speak English. So the question is why would they not rather play on their own server in china? Is it because the non official lol servers in china are shit? I might be mistaken but i heard china has a few lol servers so im really just curious as to why they chose to play on OCE.

There is at least some reason to why they might sound offensive even if they are not really intending to appear that way. Since culturally Chinese utilises insults in a casual environment such as a conversation between friends and ofc video games chat quite often. It's not a "trying to get under your skin" but rather just joking around, they're also open to be "insulted", as long as the "jokes" are not too cutting too deep or going too far.

That's probably the reason why that particular stereotype came up, saying that Chinese people are always arguing or something along the lines, when it's strictly a cultural thing.

HOWEVER, 

There is always a flip side to all of this, a game culture like this has a higher chance to breed ragers. So there's that too I guess.

Tbh I am not sure why there seems to be an influx of non-English speaking Chinese players recently, which is definitely fine as I am not picky about my teammates, but MAN, don't some of them REALLY need to calm the hell down and shut the fk up.

Me n my mates "top play safe u are now behind". No response. Chinese player walks back to lane (as my experience they always have flash ignight not tp). Same as first time (even though they are at least 1 level behind) straight onto the enemy champ no farm. Another death. Opponent leaves lane no pings still no communication. This continues up until about 12 mins in usually around 0/7/0. Then they start with the broken english. No gank. U dogs. Australia sh*t and whatever other garbled nonsence they come out with. Tgen they start wandering into enemy jungle and mid feeding and trolling all the while. Gg game over. End screen. Block and report. Wait a couple of mins. Champ select. Same chinese player. Same thing calls top rinse and repeat. The 2 issues are A reporting for trolling not picking up these players and B the block only seems to effect the chat. I would personally have a longer que time and avoid seeing these players on my team. Than have 2 or more games stuck with them over and over.
